review: Works great, I also have a Roku 2 on a different TV and I wouldn't say I have a preference between the two, other than that I got this one for a promo rate of $19 and I loved the price! The remote is smaller than the Roku one, which I like, but if you are prone to losing remotes you might not like it.

review: Love it so much!! We bought our first one in Nov to use in the bedroom to play Netflix. After a month we found ourselves moving from the bedroom to the living room almost every day. So we ended up buying another one! We found so many more uses than JUST Netflix, well worth the money!!
